course_description: This course focuses on a variety of topics that complement the material covered in Macroeconomic Theory I and II. Topics may include investment models, consumption models , monetary policy , fiscal policy, and financial/real sector interactions.
sections: Class Nbr: 5694, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-6p, Instructor: K. Kopecky, Status: Open
